title: Custom Apartment Search
posting_body: I am a licensed professional real estate agent and I am here to help you navigate the housing market.
As a Realtor® I subscribe to a strict code of ethics and integrity set forth by the National Association of Realtors.
Your best interest is my priority.
Please call/text and let me know how I may help you .
Whenever you lease an apartment and list me as your referral source, the apartment complex pays me a referral fee for bringing them a qualified tenant.
I will just need the following from you to get started:
Credit Score Range - best approval odds at 600 or better
I am Licensed with the STATE OF TEXAS.
My experience includes investors, developers, property management, apartment locating, and residential real estate.
Thank you for choosing Bird Nest Team @ Core One Real Estate.
I look forward to working with you!
Houston | Austin | Galveston | Dallas | San Antonio
This is an advertisement for an apartment locating service.
If relocating you will need an offer letter.
Must have proof of gross income for 3X the rent
